    • getState

      public int getState() throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method used to check the client's state. State is 0 when then client wants to make an offer. State is 1 when the purchase is successful. State is -1 when the purchase fails.
      Specified by:
      getState in interface PriceWriterReader
      Returns:
      client's state
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - It handles exceptions that may occur during execution of a remote method call.
